## DataAdapter.rename() method

Rename a file or folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rename(normalizedPath: string, normalizedNewPath: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>normalizedPath</code> | <code>string</code> | current path to file/folder, use [normalizePath()](normalizePath.md) to normalize beforehand. |
|  <code>normalizedNewPath</code> | <code>string</code> | new path to file/folder, use [normalizePath()](normalizePath.md) to normalize beforehand. |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<void>`
